title: Ticket #3177: better dprintf for reaping children of the master
description: I saw the condor_master kill a hung schedd without printing a line saying the schedd was gone. to debug further, it would be useful to have better debugging output.
remarks:
2012-Aug-03 15:58:26 by zmiller:
CODE REVIEW by jfrey -- looks fine.
